author: superlouis.eth
content: Hello! I was surprised to see today that my validator has a pending withdrawal for the outstanding ETH. I didn't know that they would be automatic as soon as the 0x01 withdrawal credentials would be set, I thought it would be on demand only. Does it mean that it will constantly withdraw the outstanding balance to the eth1 address, every few days?

author: g11tech
content: yes and its totally free (no gas costs/fee)

author: sansar57
content: Let’s see how many BLS addresses aren’t able to change to 0x01.
